choices.primary: Used for bare-metal or docker deployment. Disable screepsmod-mongo. The output is config.yaml
choices.advanced: Used for docker-compose deployment. Force enable screepsmod-mongo. The output is config.yaml and docker-compose.yaml

choices.admin-utils: Provide a collection of useful utilities for private server admin
choices.mongo: Use MongoDB and Redis to replace default built-in LokiJS storage
choices.pure-automation: Disable all UI actions. Players should automating everything
choices.remote-console: Allow players to access their consoles on private server by ssh

inputTickRate: Input tick rate in milliseconds. (Any positive number is valid, but it is recommended to be above 1000, otherwise your players may complain ticking too quickly)
inputMaptoolUser: Input user name for maptool mod
inputMongoVolume: Input volume name for mongo data
inputRedisVolume: Input volume name for redis data

choices.unless-stopped: restart when container exits until manually stopped (Recommended)
